com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.gles

Class Texture2dProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.gles.Texture2dProgram

  • public class Texture2dProgram
extends Object
    GL program and supporting functions for textured 2D shapes.

        public static final int KERNEL_SIZE
        See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Texture2dProgram

        public Texture2dProgram(Texture2dProgram.ProgramType programType)
        Prepares the program in the current EGL context.

    • Method Detail

      • release

        public void release()
        Releases the program.

        The appropriate EGL context must be current (i.e. the one that was used to create the program).

      • getProgramType

        public Texture2dProgram.ProgramType getProgramType()
        Returns the program type.

      • createTextureObject

        public int createTextureObject()
        Creates a texture object suitable for use with this program.

        On exit, the texture will be bound.

      • setKernel

        public void setKernel(float[] values,
                      float colorAdj)
        Configures the convolution filter values.
        Parameters:
        values - Normalized filter values; must be KERNEL_SIZE elements.

      • setTexSize

        public void setTexSize(int width,
                       int height)
        Sets the size of the texture. This is used to find adjacent texels when filtering.

      • draw

        public void draw(float[] mvpMatrix,
                 FloatBuffer vertexBuffer,
                 int firstVertex,
                 int vertexCount,
                 int coordsPerVertex,
                 int vertexStride,
                 float[] texMatrix,
                 FloatBuffer texBuffer,
                 int textureId,
                 int texStride)
        Issues the draw call. Does the full setup on every call.
        Parameters:
        mvpMatrix - The 4x4 projection matrix.
        vertexBuffer - Buffer with vertex position data.
        firstVertex - Index of first vertex to use in vertexBuffer.
        vertexCount - Number of vertices in vertexBuffer.
        coordsPerVertex - The number of coordinates per vertex (e.g. x,y is 2).
        vertexStride - Width, in bytes, of the position data for each vertex (often vertexCount * sizeof(float)).
        texMatrix - A 4x4 transformation matrix for texture coords. (Primarily intended for use with SurfaceTexture.)
        texBuffer - Buffer with vertex texture data.
        texStride - Width, in bytes, of the texture data for each vertex.
